name: Trinity
detailed_description:
Trinity is a immersive and atmospheric first person game where you have to use your wit and the abilities available to understand and solve every room.
The game is set in a surrealistic universe with every level being base around theme as much as in their stucture as in their aesthetic and the player will live a spiritual journey throughout life and will face challenging puzzle with an fps/puzzle mechanic never seen before.

Are you ready to live the experience which is Trinity?
